channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec -- Endpoint Detection and Response (SEDR)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec -- Endpoint Detection and Response (SEDR)

item.title: CVE-2019-19547|2024-08-05T02:16:48.469Z -- symantec -- endpoint%20detection%20and%20response%20%28sedr%29
item.description: Symantec Endpoint Detection and Response (SEDR), prior to 4.3.0, may be susceptible to a cross site scripting (XSS) issue. XSS is a type of issue that can enable attackers to inject client-side scripts into web pages viewed by other users. An XSS vulnerability may be used by attackers to potentially bypass access controls such as the same-origin policy.
